message.Suicide: You throw yourself down the staircase as an attempt at suicide. You die. ğŸ’€
message.Game Completed: ğŸ‰  You have found the Jade Statue ğŸ† and have completed your quest! ğŸ‰
message.Try again: Keep trying, your answer is #percent% correct... You have #attempts attempts left...
message.I:
âœ…1ï¸âƒ£âœ… West of House ğŸ 
 You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. ğŸšª
 There is a small mailbox here. ğŸ“«
message.II:
âœ…2ï¸âƒ£âœ… South of House ğŸ 
 You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded. ğŸšª
message.III:
âœ…3ï¸âƒ£âœ… You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south. ğŸ§­
There is an open grating, descending into darkness.
message.IV:
âœ…4ï¸âƒ£âœ… You are in a tiny cave with a dark, forbidding staircase leading down.
 ğŸ’€ There is a skeleton of a human male in one corner.
message.V:
âœ…5ï¸âƒ£âœ… You have entered a mud-floored room.
 Lying half buried in the mud is an old trunk, bulging with jewels.
message.VI:
âœ…6ï¸âƒ£âœ… Temple ğŸ›ï¸
 You are at the north end of a large temple. On the east wall is an ancient inscription. Below is a staircase leading down. â¬‡ï¸
 There is a brass bell here. ğŸ””
message.VII:
âœ…7ï¸âƒ£âœ… Altar ğŸ•¯ï¸
 You are at the south end of a large temple. In front of you is an altar. In one corner is a small hole in the floor. ğŸ•³ï¸
 On the altar is a large black book, open to page 569. ğŸ“–
message.VIII:
âœ…8ï¸âƒ£âœ… Dam Lobby ğŸŒŠ
 This room appears to have been the waiting room for dam tours. There are doorways to the north and east marked 'Private'. ğŸšª
 A matchbook is here. ğŸ”¥
message.IX:
âœ…9ï¸âƒ£âœ… Chasm ğŸŒ‰
 A chasm runs southwest to northeast. You are on the south side where a crack opens into a passage. â›°ï¸
message.X:
âœ…ğŸ”Ÿâœ… Maintenance Room ğŸ”§
 This appears to be a maintenance room. Most equipment is gone. On the wall are buttons colored blue, yellow, brown, and red. ğŸ”´ğŸŸ¡ğŸŸ¤ğŸ”µ
 There is a wrench and screwdriver here. ğŸ”§
message.XI:
âœ…1ï¸âƒ£1ï¸âƒ£âœ… Loud Room ğŸ“¢
 You are in a large room with a ceiling lost in darkness. The room is deafeningly loud with rushing water sounds. ğŸŒŠğŸ’§
 There is a large platinum bar on the ground. âœ¨
message.XII:
âœ…1ï¸âƒ£2ï¸âƒ£âœ… Entrance to Hades ğŸ”¥
 You are outside a large gateway inscribed 'Abandon every hope all ye who enter here!' ğŸ’€
 Evil spirits block the way through. ğŸ‘»
message.XIII:
âœ…1ï¸âƒ£3ï¸âƒ£âœ… Mirror Room ğŸª
 You are in a large square room. On the south wall is an enormous mirror filling the entire wall. âœ¨
message.XIV:
âœ…1ï¸âƒ£4ï¸âƒ£âœ… Bat Room ğŸ¦‡
 You are in a small room with doors to the east and south. In the corner is a large vampire bat. ğŸ¦‡
 There is an exquisite jade figurine here. ğŸ—¿
message.XV:
âœ…1ï¸âƒ£5ï¸âƒ£âœ… Sandy Cave ğŸ–ï¸
 This is a sand-filled cave. You notice the sand looks recently disturbed. ğŸï¸
 Something valuable might be buried here! ğŸ’

I.open mailbox: ğŸ“« Opening the small mailbox reveals a leaflet.
I.go east: ğŸšª The door is boarded and you cannot remove the boards.
I.open door: ğŸšª The door cannot be opened.
I.look at house: ğŸ  The house is a beautiful colonial house which is painted white. It is clear that the owners must have been extremely wealthy.
I.read leaflet:
ğŸˆ WELCOME TO ZORK the Unofficial TypeScript Version of Zork. ğŸˆ
 ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. â˜ ï¸ 
 In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. ğŸ—ºï¸ 
 No computer should be without one! ğŸ’»

II.go west: You would need a machete ğŸ”ª to go further west.
II.go north: â›°ï¸ The forest becomes impenetrable to the North.
II.go south: â›ˆï¸ Storm-tossed trees block your way.

III.light room: ğŸ’¡ You would need a torch or lamp to do that.
III.go south: ğŸ‘¹ You see a large ogre and turn around.

IV.take skeleton: ğŸ˜ Why would you do that? Are you some sort of sicko?
IV.smash skeleton: ğŸ˜ Sick person. Have some respect mate.
IV.light room: ğŸ’¡ You would need a torch or lamp to do that.
IV.break skeleton: â‰ï¸ I have two questions: Why and With What?

VI.read inscription: The inscription is in an ancient language. You can make out the word 'PRAY'. ğŸ™
VI.go east: You find a small Egyptian room with hieroglyphics. There's nothing of value here.
VI.take bell: You take the brass bell. It feels heavy and ancient. ğŸ””

VII.read book: ğŸ“– The book contains ancient prayers and incantations. You feel a mystical presence.
VII.pray: âœ¨ A bright light fills the room! You are transported to a forest clearing.
VII.take book: The book is too heavy and seems bound to the altar by some mystical force. ğŸš«

VIII.take matches: You take the matchbook. It reads 'Visit Beautiful FCD#3'. ğŸ”¥
VIII.go north: You enter a maintenance room with colorful buttons.
VIII.go east: You see various maintenance equipment scattered about.

IX.go southwest: The path is too narrow and dangerous. âš ï¸
IX.go northeast: You carefully navigate the chasm edge heading northeast. ğŸŒ‰
IX.look down: You see a deep chasm with water flowing far below. ğŸŒŠ

X.push yellow button: Click! âœ… You hear machinery whirring to life somewhere.
X.push red button: âš ï¸ Warning lights flash! You quickly back away.
X.push blue button: Nothing happens. The button seems inactive. ğŸ’¤
X.take wrench: You take the heavy wrench. ğŸ”§

XI.echo: ğŸ”Š You shout 'ECHO!' The acoustics change subtly. The deafening noise becomes bearable!
XI.take bar: You carefully pick up the valuable platinum bar. âœ¨
XI.go up: You climb up the stone stairway. ğŸªœ

XII.ring bell: ğŸ”” The bell becomes red hot and falls! The spirits freeze in terror as an ancient power manifests.
XII.go south: ğŸ‘» The evil spirits block your way, jeering and cackling.
XII.read book: ğŸ“– Each word reverberates powerfully. A voice commands 'Begone, fiends!' The spirits flee!

XIII.rub mirror: ğŸª As you touch the mirror, it ripples like water! There's a deep rumbling from within the earth.
XIII.look mirror: You see your reflection, but something seems... different about it. ğŸ‘¤
XIII.break mirror: That would bring seven years of bad luck! You reconsider. ğŸš«

XIV.take jade: ğŸ—¿ You carefully pick up the exquisite jade figurine. It's remarkably detailed!
XIV.look bat: ğŸ¦‡ The vampire bat hangs upside down, holding its nose. It seems repelled by something...
XIV.take bat: The bat flaps away angrily! ğŸ¦‡ğŸ’¨

XV.dig sand: â›ï¸ You dig into the sand... You found a beautiful scarab! ğŸ’
XV.take sand: The sand slips through your fingers. â³
XV.look sand: The sand appears recently disturbed, as if something was buried here. ğŸ”
